sentences.en: Announcing our engagement was a relief.
sentences.cn: 宣布婚约让我们松了一口气。

sentences.en: He cannot go for he has a previous engagement.
sentences.cn: 他不能去,因他已先有约会.

sentences.en: I can't see you on Monday because I have a previous engagement.
sentences.cn: 星期一我不能见你,因为我有约在先.

sentences.en: I felt our engagement was quite an unhappy time.
sentences.cn: 我觉得我们订婚期间非常不愉快。

sentences.en: It was my mother's very own engagement ring.
sentences.cn: 这正是我母亲自己的订婚戒指.

sentences.en: Janis and Kurt have announced their engagement.
sentences.cn: 贾尼斯和库尔特已宣布订婚。

sentences.en: Naomi was showing off her engagement ring.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米正在炫耀她的订婚戒指。

sentences.en: Owing to a previous engagement, I shan't be able to come.
sentences.cn: 因事先另有约会, 我无法前来.

sentences.en: She backed out of her engagement.
She chose Maggie to make her up for her engagement photographs.
sentences.cn: 她选择玛吉为她拍订婚照的时候化妆。

sentences.en: Since you have a previous engagement, why didn't you say so?
sentences.cn: 既然有事, 何不早说?

sentences.en: The couple eventually wed after three year engagement.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇在订婚三年后终于结婚了.

sentences.en: The engagement has been called off.
Their engagement was announced in the paper.
sentences.cn: 他们订婚的消息在报上公布了。

sentences.en: Their secret engagement was finally revealed. I always say murder will out.
sentences.cn: 他们的密约终于被揭露了,我常说纸是包不住火的.

sentences.en: This is his only public speaking engagement on the tour.
sentences.cn: 这是他此行唯一一场公开演讲。

sentences.en: Tony was stunned when Lisa suddenly broke off their engagement (= finished it ).
sentences.cn: 托尼对莉萨突然解除他俩的婚约感到震惊。

words.tran_cn: 保证；约定；同…订婚（engage的过去分词）
从事；答应，保证；交战；啮合
吸引，占用；使参加；雇佣；使订婚；预定

trans.tran_en: an agreement between two people to marry, or the period of time they are engaged
